thread.title: Repair of two trenches, road dug at Mahleur National Wildlife Refuge cost more than $100,000
thread.title_full: Repair of two trenches, road dug at Mahleur National Wildlife Refuge cost more than $100,000

author: Maxine Bernstein | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Repair of two trenches, road dug at Mahleur National Wildlife Refuge cost more than $100,000
text: Two of the seven defendants set for trial next month, Jake Ryan and Duane Ehmer, are accused of digging the trenches and charged with depredation of government property, considered a felony when damage and repair is more than $1,000.
